description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

home.title: Welcome to Tellifon!
home.text: Tellifon is a service that allows you to anonymously and securely share your skills, have a casual chat with friends or an important company meeting. We are hosted entirely in Switzerland, end to end encrypted and officialy William Tell approved.
home.get-started: To get started, simply choose one of the categories on the left and join an existing event or create your own.

image.drag-drop: Drag and drop or click to select an image

created.title: Event Created
created.text: Your event has been successfully created. You can find it at the following location:
created.link: Please write this link down and share it with the participants of your event.
